attributes.action: help all small businesses to survive by raising the VAT threshold to £500,000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: . It is suggested that small shops will not exist after 2015 if something is not done to help/protect us.  Imagine a world full of just the big supermarkets or only being able to shop on line! Those of us that love and use the little shops ,those of us who like to have a choice, those of us who own or work in these little local businesses Please sign here if you agree that the VAT threshold should be raised for all small businesses as we are  struggling to survive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
